name: POSTAL: RUN!
description:
Runner created based on the popular video game series "POSTAL".

Run, beat the record, jump and try to cope with a gradually gaining speed! All this and much more awaits you in "POSTAL: RUN!".

Developer: The Forge of the Games
Publisher: The Forge of the Games
